S

SecretBlock - Class in main.sprites.blocks
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
Class Description:

Class defining the SecretBlock (supposedly one-up block in original game but "YOLO" block in this game).
SecretBlock(Mario, Group, int, float, float, float, Image...) - Constructor for class main.sprites.blocks.SecretBlock
Constructs a single SecretBlock (tile which generates one-ups in original game, but "YOLO" image in this game).
setActiveFloor(int) - Method in class main.sprites.StageFloorBase
Removes or Adds the StageElements (StageBlocks, Enemies) based on which zone the player resides on.
setAllStageElements(StageBlock...) - Static method in class main.SpriteHandler
Adds all Stage Elements (StageBLock: Bricks and Tiles) specified to global List (where both active and inactive StageBlocks exist).
Activity (whose Logic is currently being executed) or inactivity is decided from stageZone property of StageBlock.
setAura() - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
Sets Aura around Mario.
setDeathSeqRunning() - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
Used to mark start of death sequence of Mario.
setEnemyCast(Enemy...) - Static method in class main.SpriteHandler
Adds all Enemies specified to global List (where both active and inactive Enemies exist).
Activity (whose Logic is currently being executed) or inactivity is decided from stageZone property of Enemy.
setGameOverUI(boolean) - Method in class main.Main
Sets game-end UI based on whether player has completed stage or died before completing.
setMidGrowth() - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
Used when Mario consumes a powerup.
setRight() - Method in class main.Main
This is called during finishing of flag pole sequence To make player go into castle
setSetMarioState(int) - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
Explicitely set Mario's state.
sMario - Variable in class main.sprites.Mario
 
Sprite - Class in main.sprites
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 2016
Class Description:

The base class that must be inherited by every Sprite of game.
Sprite(String, float, float, float, float, Image...) - Constructor for class main.sprites.Sprite
Creates a single stationary sprite with given data.
Sprite(String[], float, float, float, float, Image...) - Constructor for class main.sprites.Sprite
Creates a single motion sprite with given data.
spriteBounds - Variable in class main.sprites.Sprite
 
spriteBoundsArray - Variable in class main.sprites.Sprite
 
spriteFrame - Variable in class main.sprites.Sprite
 
SpriteHandler - Class in main
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 2016
Class Description:

Class defining Data Sets for the Sprites in game.
Used to retrieve/remove and perform other operations such as logic execution with Sprites.
SpriteHandler() - Constructor for class main.SpriteHandler
 
StageBlock - Interface in main.sprites.blocks
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
Class Description:

Interface which must be implemented by every StageBlock element.
StageFloorBase - Class in main.sprites
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
Class Description:

Class defining the Stage's Floor in game.
StageFloorBase(String[], Image...) - Constructor for class main.sprites.StageFloorBase
Constructs a single floor base for the stage.
STAGEWIDTH - Static variable in class main.Main
 
StarBrick - Class in main.sprites.blocks
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
Class Description:

Class defining the StarBlock (which generates Immunity Star in game).
StarBrick(Mario, int, Group, float, float, float, float, Image[], Image...) - Constructor for class main.sprites.blocks.StarBrick
Constructs a single Star Brick (brick which generates ImmunityStar).
start(Stage) - Method in class main.Main
 
stop(boolean) - Method in class main.GameLoop
Stops the Logic Execution and goes to display final ending sequence based on whether player failed or succeeded in completed stage.
stopJump() - Method in class main.Main
To stop the player's jump in mid air.
switchStagePath() - Method in class main.Main
To switch stage style after flag has been destroyed.
switchStates() - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
Used to switch to next Mario State when Mario consumes powerup.
